item.title: Test R Markdown Script
item.description: Here is a test markdown document This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.

item.title: First big trip - My Indian Adventure
Contact
item.description: Social media links are in the header otherwise fill out the form below. I have used Formspree to make the form so they will ask you to confirm your email. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
